title: Woolley's Classic Suites And Simmons Earn Rave Reviews For Delivering A Luxurious Sleep Experience
text:
Simmons Bedding Company
Hotel Tops Expedia.Com's 2015 Best Reviewed U.S.Hotels; 4th Best Worldwide
ATLANTA , Sept. 24, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- The Woolley family, owners of Woolley's Classic Suites , has made its hospitality brands synonymous with Simmons Hospitality Bedding since the late 1960s. Together, they have created a luxurious, guest sleep experience that's earning rave reviews from hotel guests. In fact, the hotel itself – which opened in May of 2014 – was recently honored with Expedia.com's best reviewed hotel in the U.S. award (4 th worldwide) based on more than 20 million verified traveler reviews. Their mattress standard? Simmons Beautyrest Black®. Combining some of the most advanced sleep technology available with luxurious comfort, it excels in both performance and appeal to discriminating travelers.
"Our top two priorities are the safety/security and comfort of our hotel guests and the sleep experience we deliver," said Jess Briley , general manager, Woolley's Classic Suites. "If they don't get a good night's sleep, we haven't done our job. After all, that's why we are in business."
In addition to a Simmons Beautyrest Black® mattress, the Woolley Classics Suites bed sits on a beautiful wood bed frame and features a luxurious custom sleep package consisting of premium linens, two king or queen-size down and fiber fill pillows and a feather topper with a signature duvet that's changed and laundered daily. Briley notes they currently get several calls a month asking how guests can order sheet sets, on top of numerous positive reviews the beds receive daily.
Currently boasting an average 4.9 out of 5 guest rating on Expedia.com and a 100 percent recommendation rate, you don't need to look beyond guest reviews to understand why Woolley's Classic Suites is leading the industry. Here's just a sampling:
"The bed was the best! Would definitely stay again!" "Rooms were very spacious and comfortable. True luxury." "Rooms were spacious, clean, comfortable and nicely decorated and the bed was incredibly comfortable. Highly recommend!" "When we got to the room we were blown away. The decor is luxurious, the bed was one of the most comfortable I have ever used and the bathroom was spectacular." Delivering an exceptional guest experience from check-in until check-out is something the Woolley family – and hotel staff -- are very passionate about.
"We view our guests as an extension of our family," said Robert Woolley , a pioneer in the hospitality industry and founder of Woolley's Classic Suites. "We believe they deserve the best service, room amenities and overall experience we can offer at an affordable price. Simmons Beautyrest will always be our standard. It's the luxurious heart of our beautiful bed."
The components and styling of the Simmons Beautyrest Black® mattress are unique, yet offer the durability and performance associated with the entire Beautyrest line. All Beautyrest Black models feature the EnduroTECH® foundation, which is designed to be 100 percent recyclable and last in a hotel room for 20 years. The product line also combines Simmons' legendary Beautyrest® Pocketed Coil® springs with an innovative temperature management design to deliver a consistently exceptional guest sleep experience. The line is also pre-treated with a high-performance stain protection technology adding to the life and cleanliness of the product.
"A great night's sleep is the ultimate luxury for everyone; guests want to feel they are special and wake rested in luxury," said Steve Tipton , vice president of Simmons Hospitality Bedding. "While we have amazing offerings in every segment of the hospitality market, delivering luxury Beautyrest® bedding is one area where we dominate. Beautyrest Black represents the ultimate hotel amenity. It says…you've arrived."
For more information on Simmons Beautyrest Black® mattresses, visit www.simmonshospitality.com .
About Simmons Bedding Company, LLC
Atlanta -based Simmons Bedding Company, LLC ("Simmons") is one of the world's largest mattress producers and the maker of Beautyrest®. Simmons manufactures and markets a broad range of products including Beautyrest®, Beautyrest TruEnergy®, Beautyrest Black®, ComforPedic® from Beautyrest®, Natural Care® and BeautySleep®. Simmons operates 19 conventional bedding manufacturing facilities across the United States , Canada and Puerto Rico . Simmons also serves as a key supplier of beds to many of the world's leading hotel groups and resort properties. Simmons is committed to developing superior mattresses and promoting a higher-quality sleep, helping ensure consumers around the world are LIVING LIFE FULLY CHARGED ® . For more information, visit www.Beautyrest.com , or follow Beautyrest on Facebook, Twitter and YouTube.
